Package org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class CartesianTimeAxis

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.Axis
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.CartesianAxis<CartesianTimeTick>
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.CartesianTimeAxis
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CartesianTimeSeriesAxis
    public class CartesianTimeAxis
extends CartesianAxis<CartesianTimeTick>
    This object is used to map defined axis as time.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      Merge a native object in the this one with a specific property name.
      This is used by plugins implementation (native java script ones) when they are not using the standard way to add plugin configuration in the options of chart.

      • merge

        public final void merge​(NativeObjectContainer source,
                        String property)
        Merge a native object in the this one with a specific property name.
        This is used by plugins implementation (native java script ones) when they are not using the standard way to add plugin configuration in the options of chart.
        Parameters:
        source - native object container to add
        property - property name
